Reaching a temperature of 40\u2103 can be harmful for your battery. Smart Charging monitors your charge status to ensure your battery is in a good state. Removing your charger could harm your battery while in the charging battery mode. Even though the phone is not charged, it\’s safe to remove charger while in the almost charged mode. %s will reduce the charge to protect your battery during the fully charged mode.
